entry.title: Center of Gravity
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,734Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Stiles coordinates Isaac's medication appointments, talks Erica through panic attacks at 2 AM, and ensures Derek remembers to eat between alpha crises. The pack calls him mom as a joke—except Derek's fingers linger when he hands Stiles coffee, and territorial displays now include standing close enough that Stiles can count his eyelashes.When a rogue omega tests their boundaries, Stiles realizes he's been building a life around taking care of Derek's pack without questioning why Derek's touch feels like coming home.Some dynamics are easier to recognize from the outside.

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,423Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 292

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hale family being a close knit family

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,545Chapters: 5/18Kudos: 30

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,725Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 28

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: my blood never tasted like wine
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene (Aconitehart)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,566Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 27

Summary: Peter looks up and frowns. "I'm busy, nephew."Shit. Stiles peeks over his shoulder and, sure enough, there's Derek Hale. Dark hair, pale eyes, stubble carefully sculpted and contoured. He looks older now, more solid, with a hint of grey at his temples.  He's wearing a suit, like every other mobster werewolf in existence. Stiles stares, open-mouthed, for a moment before he realises that Derek is glaring at him. Mortified, he turns away, his heart banging against his rib cage."Ah, that's right," Peter says, lazily waving a hand. "You two are already acquainted."That's not really how Stiles would put it, but he keeps his mouth shut. He stares down at his hands, feeling Derek's gaze boring holes through him."The Stilinski kid is here looking for work?" Derek asks, sounding almost disgusted. "He's going to be dancing here?""I feel like a broken record," Stiles snaps, twisting around to look at Derek again. "For the last time, all of my clothes are staying on. I'm not going to writhe around a stripper pole to entertain a bunch of wolves. But I can mix drinks and serve cocktails, okay? That's what I want to do."

entry.title: song of the phoenix
entry.summary:
Author: graveltotempo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 185,261Chapters: 46/55Kudos: 5,663

Summary: In a last ditch effort to save Beacon Hills after everyone else has died, Stiles channels all of his energy and magic into cleansing the Nemeton and the magical core of the town.But he is more powerful than he knows, more connected to the Nemeton than anyone can guess, and a group of kids, teenagers and adults wakes up in the middle of the night ten years earlier with a second chance they didn't know they needed and a bond they don't understand.Stiles though? Stiles wakes up with a little more.

entry.title: neural networks lead (me home to you)
entry.summary:
Author: buttercup_beetle

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,429Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles leaves his window rolled down, and through it, he can faintly hear the chirping of the cicadas in the fields beyond the parking lot. The streetlamps block out whatever stars they might have been able to see, but all in all, it’s nice. The little numbers on the dash say that it’s just past three-thirty in the morning. In the dark, he can just see the lines of his profile. Stiles thinks, oddly, that watching Derek Hale as he eats a cheap burger in an empty parking lot might be one of the most intimate experiences of his entire life.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,716Chapters: 8/11Kudos: 730

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: Interrogation Tactics
entry.summary:
Author: MrWinchester67

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,602Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 129

Summary: Written for the Tumblr Prompt-Imagine there are grumbles of frustration as Stiles walks into the FBI offices. When he asks what is going on, they say there’s a suspect in interrogation that won’t break, won’t even say a word. Stiles takes one glance at the file and has to fight the urge to laugh. “Let me take a crack at him.” “Good luck,” the other agents say, thinking Stiles doesn't stand a chance. Stiles walks into the interrogation room, and just stands there. He folds his arms over his chest and lifts an eyebrow questioningly. The guy breaks and talks, telling Stiles everything. The other agents are floored. The Rookie Stiles Stilinski - skinny, flailing, chatty, newbie Stiles - broke the infamous Derek Hale with just a look.
